com.spotify.android.appremote.api

Interface ContentApi


  • public interface ContentApi
    Get a list of content or start playback of a playable content item Get an instance of a ContentApi with SpotifyAppRemote.getContentApi()
    See Also:
    SpotifyAppRemote

    • Method Detail

      • getRecommendedContentItems

        CallResult<ListItems> getRecommendedContentItems(java.lang.String type)
        Get a list of recommended content Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Parameters:
        type - the type of content you want to fetch. May be one of defined ContentApi.ContentType
        Returns:
        a pending call result for recommended content items for that ContentType.

      • getChildrenOfItem

        CallResult<ListItems> getChildrenOfItem(ListItem item,
                                        int perpage,
                                        int offset)
        Get a list of child items of a browsable (non-playable) content item Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1
        Parameters:
        item - the content item (retrieved from getRecommendedContentItems(String)) of which you want to access the children
        perpage - the number of children to fetch
        offset - index of first child item to fetch, 0-indexed
        Returns:
        a pending call result with content items

      • playContentItem

        CallResult<Empty> playContentItem(ListItem item)
        Start playback of a playable ListItem Introduced in com.spotify.protocol.client.RequiredFeatures#FEATURES_V1

        ListItem is playable if ListItem.playable returns true

        Parameters:
        item - the ListItem which you want to play
        Returns:
        a pending call result that can be used to track the success/failure of this command
